channel.title: Flink on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Flink on Mark Needham

item.title: Flink SQL: Exporting nested JSON to a Kafka topic
item.description: I’ve been playing around with Flink as part of a workshop that I’m doing at JFokus in a couple of weeks and I wanted to export some data from Flink to Apache Kafka in a nested format. In this blog post we’ll learn how to do that. Setup We’re going to be using the following Docker Compose config: docker-compose.yml version: "3" services: zookeeper: image: zookeeper:latest container_name: zookeeper hostname: zookeeper ports: - "2181:2181" environment: ZOO_MY_ID: 1 ZOO_PORT: 2181 ZOO_SERVERS: server.
